Usage: $0 run <platform>

Description:

  Builds and installs your application for a specific platform.

  Automatically detects platform SDK support and uses the correct environment.

  See each environment for available [options].

Examples:

  $ $0 run android
  $ $0 run android --device
  $ $0 run android --emulator

Also see:

  $0 local run <platform>
  $0 remote run <platform>
